bug.author: liuzx32
bug.description: The script in scala-package/spark for mxnet on spark. wget <denchmark-link:https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/mxnet.liuyz/data/mnist/train.txt>https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/mxnet.liuyz/data/mnist/train.txt</denchmark-link> throw 404, how can I get the train.txt and val.txt data?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/szha>@szha</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yzhliu>@yzhliu</denchmark-link> Thank you for the training data!

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/liuzx32>@liuzx32</denchmark-link> thanks for submitting this issue. It appears that you were able to obtain the training data. Could you please close the issue? The S3 bucket you have mentioned does not exist. You can obtain MNIST training data here as well- <denchmark-link:http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/>http://yann.lecun.com/exdb/mnist/</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nswamy>@nswamy</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/liuzx32>@liuzx32</denchmark-link> I have updated the link, I think this issue can be closed now.
